q1.name: Steel Tempest
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and applying {{tip|on-hit}} and {{tip|on-attack}} effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. ''Steel Tempest'' can {{tip|critically strike}} for {{ft|{{as|{{critical damage|40|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.|80% of the {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}} champions usually have.}}
If ''Steel Tempest'' hits an enemy with the thrust, '''Yasuo''' gains a ''Gathering Storm'' stack for 6 seconds, which refreshes upon receiving the second stack.

While '''Yasuo''' has two stacks of ''Gathering Storm'', ''Steel Tempest'' consumes the stacks to instead unleash a whirlwind that travels in the target direction, dealing the same damage and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies hit for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, or {{fd|0.9}} seconds in combination with {{ai|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}}.

{{tt|''Steel Tempest's'' thrust|Not when at two stacks}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} if '''Yasuo''' is affected by {{tip|complete crowd control}} during the cast time but its {{sti|cooldown}} is reset to {{fd|0.1}} seconds.

Casting ''Steel Tempest'' during {{ai|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}} will instead affect enemies around '''Yasuo''' at the end of the dash, or doing so immediately at his landing location after {{tip|Blink|blinking}} while ending the dash prematurely. Casting {{ai|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}} when ''Steel Tempest's'' remaining cooldown is less than {{fd|0.5}} seconds resets this remaining cooldown to 0.

If '''Yasuo''' becomes unable to cast abilities during the dash after buffering, ''Steel Tempest'' will not cast, but will still go on cooldown. {{bug|2}}
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yasuo thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and applying on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. Steel Tempest can critically strike for
If Steel Tempest hits an enemy with the thrust, Yasuo gains a Gathering Storm stack for 6 seconds, which refreshes upon receiving the second stack.
While Yasuo has two stacks of Gathering Storm, Steel Tempest consumes the stacks to instead unleash a whirlwind that travels in the target direction, dealing the same damage and knocking up all enemies hit for 0.75 seconds, or 0.9 seconds in combination with Sweeping Blade.
Steel Tempest's thrust is interrupted if Yasuo is affected by complete crowd control during the cast time but its cooldown is reset to 0.1 seconds.
Casting Steel Tempest during Sweeping Blade will instead affect enemies around Yasuo at the end of the dash, or doing so immediately at his landing location after blinking while ending the dash prematurely. Casting Sweeping Blade when Steel Tempest's remaining cooldown is less than 0.5 seconds resets this remaining cooldown to 0.

If Yasuo becomes unable to cast abilities during the dash after buffering, Steel Tempest will not cast, but will still go on cooldown. Unknown value: bug 2
q1.notes:
* At one ''Gathering Storm'' stack, the ability is named ''Steel Wind Rising''.
* The whirlwind from consuming stacks of ''Gathering Storm'' can strike targets whose center is behind '''Yasuo''', unlike most [[Projectile|missiles]].
* The whirlwind is not released when cast during {{ai|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}}, but instead {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} all enemies hit around '''Yasuo''' at the end of the dash for the same duration.
* ''Steel Tempest'' applies {{tip|basic damage}} for the first (closest) enemy hit and {{tip|area damage}} for secondary enemies:
** ''Steel Tempest'' will apply [[on-hit]] effects to the first target hit, but will not do so to the secondary ones.
** ''Steel Tempest'' will not apply [[ability effects|spell effects]] to the first target hit, but will do so to the secondary ones.
** {{stil|Spell vamp}} and {{ri|Ravenous Hunter}} will only grant {{tip|heal|healing}} from the damage dealt to secondary targets, and healing is reduced to 33% effectiveness, accordingly.
** {{stil|Life steal}} will heal based on the damage dealt to the first target hit.
* The whirlwind is a missile and can therefore be {{tip|projectile|intercepted}}.
* ''Steel Tempest'' will only draw minion aggro if the first target is a champion.
* ''Steel Tempest'' will cast from wherever '''Yasuo''' is at the end of the cast time.
* Each parry has different interactions with this ability, whether it's the first target of ''Steel Tempest'' or the secondary one. In either case '''Yasuo''' still gains a stack of ''Gathering Storm'' and his whirlwind knock-up cannot be negated by parries:
** {{tip|Dodge}}: both first target and secondary target '''do not''' take damage.
** {{tip|Block}}: first target '''does not''' take damage, secondary target '''does''' take damage.
** {{tip|Blind}}: both first target and secondary target '''do''' take damage.
* ''Steel Tempest'' rolls its {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} individually against each enemy hit.
* If ''Steel Tempest'' is buffered during ''Sweeping Blade'' and '''Yasuo''' uses {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Teleport}} or {{ii|Hextech Rocketbelt}}, ''Steel Tempest'' will go on cooldown without casting. In ''Protobelt's'' case '''Yasuo''' will also need to cast a movement command after it, else ''Steel Tempest'' will still trigger.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} does not prevent a stack of ''Gathering Storm'' from being gained.
* While at two stacks, a range indicator will be shown for the effective range of the whirlwind.
q1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '4,4,4,4,4' as '4'

i1.name: Way of the Wanderer
description: {{sbc|Innate - Intent:}} '''Yasuo's''' {{as|{{sti|'''total''' critical strike chance}}}} is multiplied by {{fd|2.5}} from all other sources, but his {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} deal only {{ft|{{as|{{critical damage|57.5|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.|90% of the {{sti|{{as|critical damage}}}} champions usually have.}} Additionally, every {{as|1% critical strike chance}} in excess of {{as|100%|critical strike chance}} is converted into {{as|{{fd|0.4}} '''bonus''' AD}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Resolve:}} '''Yasuo''' generates {{tip|Flow}} for every {{pp|59 to 46 for 3|1 to 13}} units he travels by any means. At{{ft|100 stacks|{{pp|59*100 to 46*100 for 3|1 to 13}} units traveled}}and upon taking damage from enemy {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|monsters}}, '''Yasuo''' consumes all {{tip|Flow}} to {{tip|shield}} himself for {{pp|115;120;125;130;135;145;155;165;180;195;210;240;270;305;345;395;455;525}} for up to 1 second.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Intent: Yasuo's total critical strike chance is multiplied by 2.5 from all other sources, but his critical strikes deal only Additionally, every 1% critical strike chance in excess of 100% is converted into 0.4 bonus AD.
Innate - Resolve: Yasuo generates Flow for every 1 to 13 ‒ undefined units he travels by any means. Atand upon taking damage from enemy champions or monsters, Yasuo consumes all Flow to shield himself for 115;120;125;130;135;145;155;165;180;195;210;240;270;305;345;395;455;525undefined − (based on level) for up to 1 second.
i1.notes:
* Taking into account '''Yasuo's''' {{as|345 '''base''' movement speed}} and assuming he's constantly moving, it will take {{pp|5900/345 to 4600/345 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds to generate 100 {{tip|Flow}} stacks.
** Taking into account the {{as|45 '''bonus''' movement speed}} that most [[boots|Tier 2 boots]] grant (resulting in {{as|390 '''total''' movement speed}}), it will take {{pp|5900/390 to 4600/390 for 3|1 to 13}} seconds to generate 100 {{tip|Flow}} stacks.
* '''Yasuo''' requires at least {{sti|{{as|40% critical strike chance}}}} in order to reach {{as|100% critical strike chance}} from ''Way of the Wanderer's'' multiplier.
* ''Way of the Wanderer'' will multiply '''Yasuo's''' {{stil|critical strike chance}} '''after''' {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} {{nie|Wrath}} is calculated.

e1.name: Sweeping Blade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|dashes}} a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} if they are in range upon arrival.
Each ''Sweeping Blade'' cast increases the next dash's '''base''' damage by 25% for 5 seconds, stacking up to two times for a 50% increase.
'''Yasuo''' cannot target the same enemy more than once every few seconds.
'''''Yasuo''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control during Sweeping Blade.''
''{{ai|R|Yasuo}} can be cast during Sweeping Blade. If {{ai|Q|Yasuo}} has been buffered, {{ai|W|Yasuo}} may also be cast during it. {{bug|2}}''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yasuo dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, dealing them magic damage if they are in range upon arrival.
Each Sweeping Blade cast increases the next dash's base damage by 25% for 5 seconds, stacking up to two times for a 50% increase.
Yasuo cannot target the same enemy more than once every few seconds.
Yasuo will be knocked down by any immobilizing crowd control during Sweeping Blade.
R can be cast during Sweeping Blade. If Q has been buffered, W may also be cast during it. Unknown value: bug 2
e1.notes:
* The on-target cooldown will be applied upon starting the dash.
* ''Sweeping Blade's'' dash speed is affected by {{stil|movement speed}}.
* ''Sweeping Blade'' will generate {{fd|7.5}} {{tip|Flow}} stacks per cast that travels the maximum distance.
* '''Yasuo''' can use ''Sweeping Blade's'' fixed dash distance to cross walls both before and after hitting his target (provided his proximity to the wall and/or target allows it).
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|0.5|0.4|0.3|0.2|0.1}}|Starts after the dash ends}}' as '0/0.5/0.4/0.3/0.2/0.1/0' and riot's value '0.5,0.4,0.3,0.2,0.1' as '0.5/0.4/0.3/0.2/0.1'

w1.name: Wind Wall
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' creates a gust of wind that travels in the target direction over {{tt|{{fd|0.25}} seconds|Estimated}} to form a wall in front of him. The wall slowly drifts forward another 50 units over {{fd|3.75}} seconds, blocking all hostile non-{{tip|turret}} {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} that attempt to pass through it.
The effect grants {{tip|sight}} in a small static area in front of the cast location.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yasuo creates a gust of wind that travels in the target direction over 0.25 seconds to form a wall in front of him. The wall slowly drifts forward another 50 units over 3.75 seconds, blocking all hostile non-turret projectiles that attempt to pass through it.
The effect grants sight in a small static area in front of the cast location.
w1.notes:
* ''Wind Wall'' starts blocking projectiles on-cast (despite not being fully formed).
* ''Wind Wall'' travels via a missile, and thus stops upon colliding with an enemy ''Wind Wall''.

r1.name: Last Breath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|blinks}} to the other side of a {{tip|sight|visible}} {{tip|airborne}} enemy champion {{tt|nearest to the cursor|searches in a 1100 radius}}, instantly generating maximum {{tip|Flow}} while resetting {{ai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo|Steel Tempest's}} stacks.

Upon arrival, he {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} the target and all {{tip|airborne}} enemy champions around them for 1 second, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them and slashing them with his sword over the duration, dealing {{as|physical damage}} thereafter. Enemy champions around the target that become {{tip|airborne}} before the effects end will also be {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for the remaining duration and dealt damage at its end.
For the next 15 seconds, '''Yasuo's''' {{tip|critical strikes}} gain {{sti|lethality|{{as|50% {{tt|'''bonus'''-armor penetration|Modifies bonus armor only}}}}}}.

''If '''Yasuo''' would be placed inside a ''{{tip|turret|turret's}}'' {{sti|attack range}} upon blinking, he will instead attempt to position himself outside it (does not apply to {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}).''
''A nearby {{tip|airborne}} enemy champion is required to cast this ability.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yasuo blinks to the other side of a visible airborne enemy champion nearest to the cursor, instantly generating maximum Flow while resetting Steel Tempest's stacks.
Upon arrival, he knocks up the target and all airborne enemy champions around them for 1 second, revealing them and slashing them with his sword over the duration, dealing physical damage thereafter. Enemy champions around the target that become airborne before the effects end will also be knocked up for the remaining duration and dealt damage at its end.
For the next 15 seconds, Yasuo's critical strikes gain 50% bonus-armor penetration.
If Yasuo would be placed inside a turret's attack range upon blinking, he will instead attempt to position himself outside it (does not apply to Nexus Obelisk).
A nearby airborne enemy champion is required to cast this ability.
r1.notes:
* ''Last Breath'' requires the target to be affected by {{tip|airborne}} from an {{tt|enemy source|from the target's perspective}}, and simultaneously that the target is not considered {{tip|cc-immune}}, {{tip|displacement immune}}, or {{tip|untargetable}} during it.
** ''Last Breath'' cannot be cast if there are no nearby enemy champions that meet the conditions.
*** Attempting to cast the ability on an enemy champion that is not airborne will indicate that they "''Must Be Airborne!''"
** Self-applied or allied-applied {{tip|airborne|displacements}} do not allow ''Last Breath'' to target the champion. Those applied by the ''neutral'' team (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock back) '''can''' be targeted.
** An [[spell indicator|indicator]] will be placed towards enemy champions that meet the cast conditions within range of ''Last Breath'' to signify the ability can be cast.
** {{ai|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} will prevent '''Yasuo''' from casting ''Last Breath'' on an airborne enemy champion outside its borders.
*** '''Yasuo''' can only do so if the airborne enemy champion is inside the zone.
* '''Yasuo''' does not need {{tip|sight}} of enemy champions near his target to affect them with the ability.
* Even if the target is protected by {{tip|spell shield}} the ability will still affect them and deal damage, but the ''spell shield'' will be consumed.
* ''Last Breath's'' {{tip|airborne|knock up}} can be fully {{tip|cleanse|cleansed}} but its damage is applied instantly after the removal.
** It is not considered {{tip|suspension}}.
* Terrain displacing abilities (e.g. {{ai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}, {{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn}}) that affect enemy champions are considered {{tip|airborne}}, and will therefore interact with ''Last Breath''.
* While ''blinking'', '''Yasuo''' creates an {{tip|untargetable}} ''clone'' of himself that cues a dashing animation (similar to {{ais|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}}) towards the target. This unit's rules do not follow those of a {{tip|clone|clone's}}. As such, it is more alike a champion, unless special cased.
* While performing ''Last Breath'', '''Yasuo''' is {{tip|lockout|locked out}} of performing actions.
** The lock out will end prematurely if '''Yasuo''' dies as well as by the following if all targets:
*** {{tip|Cleanse}} the {{tip|airborne|knock up}}.
*** Are too far away from '''Yasuo'''.
*** Leave '''Yasuo's''' {{tip|sight}} (e.g. by {{tip|nearsight}}).
*** Become {{tip|untargetable}}.
*** {{tip|Death|Die}}.
*** Enter the {{ai|Realm of Death|Mordekaiser}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Yasuo''' is locked out:
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=false|consume=false|spells=true, false, false, false, false|interrupts=false}}
